column4: Hey all. Are you allowed to ask questions here, you cannot really find/understand from searching the net?

Hey all. I have just installed Ubuntu for the first time. I have two monitors connected to my computer and I have enabled dual screen. However, my "primary" screen is to the right and the other to the left.. makint it all backwards - how do i change which screen should be the primary one?
Did you try to drag the screens around in the gui, that might work.
